publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: Zǐyóu asked about filial piety.

sense.def: Name of a disciple of Confucius

tls:text.tls:line: I will teach you to understand things.

sense.def: cognate object; indefinite dummy object pronouns without reference: things, people; someone 以約失之者"Those who, through keeping to the main thing, get things wrong"

tls:text.tls:line: I will teach you to understand things.

sense.def: final exclamatory particle 必也射乎And if he has to, it is surely in archery!

tls:text.tls:line: When you understand something consider that you understand it;

sense.def: abstract object pronoun without reference (but which can have co-reference with other pronouns): something

tls:text.tls:line: When you understand something consider that you understand it;

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned object: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: When you understand something consider that you understand it;

sense.def: take it to be the case that S, consider that S

tls:text.tls:line: when you do not understand something, consider that you do not understand it.

sense.def: believe that S

tls:text.tls:line: when you do not understand something, consider that you do not understand it.

sense.def: take it to be the case that S, consider that S

tls:text.tls:line: In such a way you will understand."

sense.def: such an (as aforementioned) action, such behaviour

tls:text.tls:line: "Rotton wood cannot be carved,

sense.def: piece of timber, piece of wood

tls:text.tls:line: A wall made of dung and mud cannot be properly plastered.

sense.def: "the NP2 made of NP1" 糞土之牆

tls:text.tls:line: Regarding Yú, in one's dealing with him, what is there to apply one's strictures to?"

sense.def: relating to, concerning

tls:text.tls:line: Regarding Yú, in one's dealing with him, what is there to apply one's strictures to?"

sense.def: when interacting with the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: "In the beginning, in relation to others,

sense.def: relate to, deal with

tls:text.tls:line: "In the beginning, in relation to others,

sense.def: other persons; other people; all the other people

tls:text.tls:line: "In the beginning, in relation to others,

sense.def: post-sentential topic marker, marker of sentence topics

tls:text.tls:line: I listened to their promises and had faith in their performance;

sense.def: word; sentence; doctrine as expressed in words

tls:text.tls:line: I listened to their promises and had faith in their performance;

sense.def: statements of opinion, proposal; public or formal utterance which commits the speaker; pronouncement; public or formal pronouncement, public or formal suggestion; Sometimes less specifically: proposal; what one says, speech; language; public proposal, public speech, words

tls:text.tls:line: I listened to their promises and had faith in their performance;

sense.def: message/pronouncement of N

tls:text.tls:line: I listen to their pronouncements and observe their performance.

sense.def: critically observe, watch carefully; look over carefully and systematically, make an overall investigation; survey and examine

tls:text.tls:line: I listen to their pronouncements and observe their performance.

sense.def: xìng: professional conduct, public demeanour, public conduct; personal conduct, behaviour

tls:text.tls:line: I listen to their pronouncements and observe their performance.

sense.def: listen to; pay attention to (without necessarily approving of)

tls:text.tls:line: In relation to Yú, dealing with him, I have thus mended my ways.

sense.def: improve on; introduce changes to; change (something) for the better; correct; adjust

tls:text.tls:line: "Why don't you each of you speak up on your aspirations?"

sense.def: your

tls:text.tls:line: "Why don't you each of you speak up on your aspirations?"

sense.def: one's high intent; one's aspirations; one's moral aspiration, one's highest ambition; one's main tendencyBUDDH: religious aspirations

tls:text.tls:line: "I hope for a carriage, a horse, clothes and a fur cloak

sense.def: hope for (something) 願之， 臣之所甚願

tls:text.tls:line: "I hope for a carriage, a horse, clothes and a fur cloak

sense.def: conveyance, cart; vehicle on wheels, especially but not always for longish-distance travel; contraption with wheels;

tls:text.tls:line: "I hope for a carriage, a horse, clothes and a fur cloak

sense.def: horse (said to resemble a deer, which goes to show that the horse was more like a pony)

tls:text.tls:line: to share with friends,

sense.def: in interaction with; in association with; with; in collusion with, in cooperation with (NB: MOVE THE HOSTILE CASES TO THE HOSTILE VARIANT!)

tls:text.tls:line: to share with friends,

sense.def: cooperate (with plural subject: should perhaps be vi2 or better vi{2}

tls:line.title: 論語 (en) Translation of 論語 into (en)

tls:text.tls:line: and if they ruin these, never to show resentment." and if they ruin these (above-mentioned things), never to show resentment."

sense.def: lack, be without; make do without; imply no (harm or loss); lack the support of (subordinates)

tls:text.tls:line: and not to make a show of my own efforts."

sense.def: deploy demonstratively, act out boastfully

tls:text.tls:line: and not to make a show of my own efforts."

sense.def: required or obligatory effort

tls:text.tls:line: "I would like to hear about your aspirations."

sense.def: polite: your 子之足

tls:text.tls:line: "I would like to hear about your aspirations."

sense.def: NP-Y is part of NP-X 仁之本

tls:text.tls:line: "I would like to hear about your aspirations."

sense.def: one's high intent; one's aspirations; one's moral aspiration, one's highest ambition; one's main tendencyBUDDH: religious aspirations

tls:text.tls:line: "The aged I would like to comfort,

sense.def: the subject/agent of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: to the young I would like to show affectionate care."

sense.def: the subject/agent of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: "When we are three people walking along

sense.def: in modern Americanised English: multiple

tls:text.tls:line: there are bound to be my teachers among them:

sense.def: from among them 一焉

tls:text.tls:line: there are bound to be my teachers among them:

sense.def: among them

tls:text.tls:line: I pick out the good points and make a point of following them,

sense.def: what is V

tls:text.tls:line: I pick out the good points and make a point of following them,

sense.def: anaphorically refers to whatever the dummy object pronoun refers to

tls:text.tls:line: and what is not good about them I improve [in myself]."

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned object: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: Confucius passed by them

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned object: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: and told Zǐlù to ask them about a ford across a river.

sense.def: ensure that someone does something> order someone to do something; dispatch someone to do something

tls:text.tls:line: "That person who is in charge of the vehicle, who is he?"

sense.def: this specific

tls:text.tls:line: "That person who is in charge of the vehicle, who is he?"

sense.def: the subject/agent of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: "That person who is in charge of the vehicle, who is he?"

sense.def: be identical with npro, be identifiable as npro

tls:text.tls:line: "He is known as Kǒng Qiū.

sense.def: be none other than

tls:text.tls:line: "Is this kind of man Confucius from Lǔ?"

sense.def: identifying: this particular person ???

tls:text.tls:line: "Is this kind of man Confucius from Lǔ?"

sense.def: identifying: this particular person ???

tls:text.tls:line: "Is this kind of man Confucius from Lǔ?"

sense.def: rhetorical question marker; particle indicating the tentativeness of a statement

tls:text.tls:line: "That man knows all about the ford."

sense.def: exclamatory/emphatic: definitely

tls:text.tls:line: "Who are you?"

sense.def: be none other than

tls:text.tls:line: "Who are you?"

sense.def: be identical with npro, be identifiable as npro

tls:text.tls:line: "I am Zhòngyóu."

sense.def: be none other than

tls:text.tls:line: "Is that the disciple of Confucius from Lǔ?"

sense.def: identifying: this particular person ???

tls:text.tls:line: "Yes."

sense.def: the contextually determinate S is true; it is so (mostly, the word in this meaning is used pro-sententially, as a pro-sentence)

seg.line: 且而與其從辟人之士也，

tls:text.tls:srcline: 且而與其從辟人之士也，
tls:text.tls:line: Come to think of it, you, instead of becoming a follower of this gentleman who avoids other people,

sense.def: shirk

tls:text.tls:srcline: 且而與其從辟人之士也，
tls:text.tls:line: Come to think of it, you, instead of becoming a follower of this gentleman who avoids other people,

sense.def: flee from; stay clear of; keep away from, get out of the way of, keep out of the way of; ZZ 37: (decide to) keep away from (high and low places); flinch before (an enemy); bypass and fail to consider (a candidate);

tls:text.tls:line: why don't you follow someone who avoids the world altogether?"

sense.def: come up to the standards of, be as good as

tls:text.tls:line: why don't you follow someone who avoids the world altogether?"

sense.def: be as good as V-ing [The syntactic category is experimental...]

tls:text.tls:line: why don't you follow someone who avoids the world altogether?"

sense.def: flee from; stay clear of; keep away from, get out of the way of, keep out of the way of; ZZ 37: (decide to) keep away from (high and low places); flinch before (an enemy); bypass and fail to consider (a candidate);

tls:text.tls:line: why don't you follow someone who avoids the world altogether?"

sense.def: shirk

tls:text.tls:line: why don't you follow someone who avoids the world altogether?"

sense.def: become a follower of

tls:text.tls:line: why don't you follow someone who avoids the world altogether?"

sense.def: accompany as a follower

tls:text.tls:line: why don't you follow someone who avoids the world altogether?"

sense.def: become a follower of; be a follower of; become a disciple of; follow and obey (a person) as a follower

tls:text.tls:line: Zǐlù went away to report on what happened.

sense.def: get on one's way; go one's way; walk off; leave the scene; be on one's way

tls:text.tls:line: "One cannot flock together with birds and beasts, you know.

sense.def: with him, with them, etc. 與戰fought a battle with him, 與知: Greek suneidein "be co-aware of"

tls:text.tls:line: "One cannot flock together with birds and beasts, you know.

sense.def: have the same> share in the same, join the same

tls:text.tls:line: If I do not associate with these (disorientated) people

sense.def: cooperate (with each other)

tls:text.tls:line: If the Way prevailed in the world

sense.def: topic place: (in that place) the proper Way prevails

tls:text.tls:line: I suppose, is only the sage."

sense.def: (presumably) only N is a case in point, only N is like this

tls:text.tls:line: He asked Bold Sink,

sense.def: to ask (somebody N2) about something contextually determinate N1 問於孔子

tls:text.tls:line: and they consulted Zēngzǐ on this.

sense.def: to ask (somebody N2) about something contextually determinate N1 問於孔子

tls:text.tls:line: pay close attention to the laws and fixed procedures,

sense.def: laws and regulations

tls:text.tls:line: was not as bad as all that.

sense.def: 如是之甚 "as intensely as that" modifying an adverb

tls:text.tls:line: and befriend the most Good of the gentlemen."

sense.def: "the more NP-Y of the NP-X" 士之仁者

tls:text.tls:line: and befriend the most Good of the gentlemen."

sense.def: "the more NP-Y of the NP-X" 士之仁者

seg.line: 人不間於其父母、昆弟之言。」

tls:text.tls:srcline: 人不間於其父母、昆弟之言。」
tls:text.tls:line: Others find nothing different in him from the pronouncements (on him?) by his parents and brothers."

sense.def: his/their N1 and... (his) N2

tls:text.tls:srcline: 人不間於其父母、昆弟之言。」
tls:text.tls:line: Others find nothing different in him from the pronouncements (on him?) by his parents and brothers."

sense.def: his/their N1 and... (his) N2
to declare one's filial love to N
those Vt-ing which/whom the explicit or implicit subject V-ed or V-s
e.g. 人所制 "someone controlled by others" the object npro that N Vt-ed; the object Vt-ed by N> that which is Vt-ed by N, he who is Vt-ed by N
direct object: e.g. 所樂 "what (the understood/contextually determinate subject) enjoys": that which (the understood subject) Vt-s； the object Vt-ed by the the understood subject
e.g. 人所制 "someone controlled by others" the object npro that N Vt-ed; the object Vt-ed by N> that which is Vt-ed by N, he who is Vt-ed by N
e.g. 人所制 "someone controlled by others" the object npro that N Vt-ed; the object Vt-ed by N> that which is Vt-ed by N, he who is Vt-ed by N
the place where the explicit or implicit subject of the phrase Vt-s the object N
die for the contextually determinate object
the N2 of ancient times
the N2 of ancient times
the N2 of ancient times
the N2 of ancient times
the N2 of ancient times
the N2 of ancient times
the N2 of ancient times
a person of lower status
important person
acoustically: pleasant to hear
what is good in N
what is good in N, good points in the person N
bad points of N2
what is bad
be difficult; 甚難
show brotherly-affection-style care for the local people

tls:text.tls:line: how can he establish a name for himself?

sense.def: become recognized successful

tls:text.tls:line: As a result the offspring of the Three Huán are facing tenuous prospects.

sense.def: Therefore

tls:text.tls:line: should one ever consider such behaviour as filial?

sense.def: Unger no. 791

tls:text.tls:line: Those who work on political administration these days are in real danger."

sense.def: be in (serious) personal danger; be in grave danger; be in deep trouble

tls:text.tls:line: Sticking his staff in the ground he started weeding.

sense.def: start to weed one's field; remove weeds

tls:text.tls:line: "Refusing to take up official functions shows a lack of moral rectitude.

sense.def: take employment

tls:text.tls:line: but one phrase will cover these.

sense.def: encompass, cover abstractly

tls:text.tls:line: When they die, one buries them according to ritual propriety,

sense.def: bury, inter

tls:text.tls:line: "What one does not want others to do to oneself,

sense.def: contraction of 之於

tls:text.tls:line: this one does not want to do to others either."

sense.def: contraction of 之於

tls:text.tls:line: The Sheriff of Chén said:

sense.def: Minister of Justice (same as 司寇）

tls:text.tls:line: When he entered the Great Temple

sense.def: ancestral temple (especially place of worship for the former kings or former rulers) and centre of state ritual

tls:text.tls:line: the Master in lamenting him showed excessive grief.

sense.def: be excessively moved to grief [make a demonstration of excessive grief vi.act??][CA]

tls:text.tls:line: "Having learnt about something, then should one practise it?"

sense.def: interrogative final particle, contraction of 之乎

tls:text.tls:line: "I imagined it was something else you would ask about.

sense.def: you, sir; you, madam

tls:text.tls:line: and unsubstantial accusations

sense.def: unsubstantial

tls:text.tls:line: pardon small mistakes,

sense.def: mistake, fault, improper action

tls:text.tls:line: "What did you mean?"

sense.def: marks a judgmental question sentence 何謂也What does this mean?

tls:text.tls:line: if friends are glib-tongued,

sense.def: be glib-tongued

tls:text.tls:line: "As for filial piety these days,

sense.def: loving respect for one's parents and ancestors (see also VIRTUE)

tls:text.tls:line: this refers to being able to nourish.

sense.def: this (particular above-mentioned thing)

tls:text.tls:line: this refers to being able to nourish.

sense.def: care properly for a contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: But when it comes to dogs and horses

sense.def: When it comes to

tls:text.tls:line: they are all able to have those they take proper care of and nourish.

sense.def: all these things

tls:text.tls:line: they are all able to have those they take proper care of and nourish.

sense.def: have the capacity to VERB properly, be constitutionally able to VERB; be physically capable of, be actually able to

tls:text.tls:line: they are all able to have those they take proper care of and nourish.

sense.def: =有所 have something which one Vs

tls:text.tls:line: they are all able to have those they take proper care of and nourish.

sense.def: nurture, nourish, bring up, rear, take good care of, provide for; provide for the needs of; maintain, provide a maintenance allowance for

tls:text.tls:line: whereby is one to make the distinction?"

sense.def: how? by what means? (non-rhet.)

tls:text.tls:line: whereby is one to make the distinction?"

sense.def: be different from the contextually determinate N

tls:text.tls:line: "The spirit displayed<1> is the difficult point.

sense.def: be problematic; be hard to understand; be a weird thing to deal with; be the problematic point
